name: additional_loan_type_other
title: Please describe the Other type of financing you will utilize.
label: 2nd Loan Other
description: Provide enough detail for the seller to understand.
tips: For these non-traditional funding methods it is important that legal contracts exist, which will need to be disclosed to the Seller. All financing arrangements must be properly documented and may require additional verification during the purchase process.
small_print: The secondary financing method described here must be verifiable and will be included in your purchase agreement.

suggested.hint: This field is required based on your previous choices.

fields.name: placeholder
fields.default_value: Enter details about your additional financing method
